steps.text: If you want to delete a previously installed certificate, open ❶ 'Control Panel.'
Select ❶ 'Internet Options' and open it.
Click on the ❶ 'Content' tab and click ❷ 'Certificates.'
Hover the cursor over ❶ '[your CNS login name]@sfc.keio.ac.jp' to check the expiration date, and if it has expired, click ❷ 'Remove.'

Click ❶ 'Yes' when the warning message appears.

How to delete an old certificate is completed.
